name: Matrix
description: Matrix produces a virtual office for remote teams. In this project, you can run a virtual office to simulate the physical environment

ROOMS_DATA.description: List of avaliable rooms office. Read more in SETUP.md

ENFORCE_SSL.description: If you running in HTTPS this variable forces redirect to HTTPS when user access with HTTP

ROOMS_SOURCE.description: Define where the room list is stored, now only supported ENVIRONMENT
